Config.Setting.ShowHandbookBeehiveKiln: Show the colors an item can be baked into using the Beehive Kiln
Config.Setting.ShowHandbookEntityDrops: Show the items harvested from creatures
Config.Setting.ShowHandbookEntityStats: Show a creature's health, damage, and damage tier
Config.Setting.ShowHandbookPanningDrops: Show potential drops when using a wooden pan
Config.Setting.ShowHandbookPitKiln: Show burn times for each type of pit kiln fuel
Config.Setting.ShowHandbookTraderGoods: Show the goods available from traders
Config.Setting.ShowCementationFurnacePro: Show progress for steel production in the cementation furnace
Config.Setting.ShowCharcoalPitProgress: Show progress of charcoal production in the charcoal pit
Config.Setting.ShowCokeOvenProgress: Show progress of the coke oven on the door
Config.Setting.ShowPitKilnProgress: Show progress of firing in the pit kiln
Config.Setting.ShowSkepProgress: Show progress of honey production in the skep
Config.Setting.ShowAnvilWorkableTemp: Show the workable temperature on the anvil
Config.Setting.ShowBlockTransitionInfo: Show the number of hours left for a block's transition state to complete
Config.Setting.ShowFarmlandDropsSoil: Show the chance of farmland dropping soil (for the 'Farmland Drops Soil' mod)
Config.Setting.ShowFarmlandProgress: Show the hours remaining until the next crop stage on farmland
Config.Setting.ShowPileTotalItems: Show the total number of items in a pile
Config.Setting.ShowSealedCrockName: Show sealed status in the name of a crock
Config.Setting.ShowStackMetalUnits: Show the total metal units based on an item's stack size
Config.Setting.ShowTemperatureInName: Show temperature in the name of an item
Config.Setting.ShowTranslocatorDestinati: Show the destination of the translocator
Config.Setting.ShowTreeStats: Show time a sapling takes to sprout and mature
sprout-in-days: Will sprout in about {0} - {p1:# days|# day|# days}
mature-in-days: Will mature in about {0} - {p1:# days|# day|# days}
